channel.title: Bullet-Scape 562!
channel.description:
[font=courier]Bullet-Scape 562!!!!!!!!!!![size=18pt][/size][/font]
[size=14pt][font=courier]Ty for all suggestions guys, :)![/font][/size]
[size=18pt][font=courier]Download Link for Bullet-Scape - http://www.mediafire.com/?xhd18ueuvreb1v1[/font][/size] And before I give you the link I wanted to tell everyone that Bullet-Scape has a full featured Quest new home in edgeville, statue takes u to heros guild with altars inside to switch prayer etc. added brand new drops!, perfect ring with 999999 of all stats, Improved dragon claws to 74 str bonus they don't fail anymore ;), added chisel on item interface thanks to the help of xxifish i x also he gets 20% of the credits, and although I am not going to Release a client with it because well idk i might later on but you can find a client almost anywhere so i may release it later on today, may not Its got new commands taking you to bosses and more also when doing the quest read your chatbox to see what to do next. Btw use chisel on book for starter then chisel on scroll :P enjoy here Is the Famous Bullet-Scape!!!
[font=courier]Download Link For Light-to-Dark:[/font] - [url=http://uppit.com/frx8qhxq4y7l/Light-To-Dark_562_Release!.rar]http://uppit.com/frx8qhxq4y7l/Light-To-Dark_562_Release!.rar[/url] Light-to-Dark is v1 Bullet-scape was highly suggested so i made it just like some of you suggested! :)!
Basically a banner i made for slayer-scape which I will be changing in the future: Before i go any further guys this is only v1 I have been working on this for on and off, since December, Some of you may have known me as the owner of slayer-scape 562 Austin, and some of you may have known me from slayer-scape recently as Defence.
My 2nd owner Which i know in Real Life Decided to Stop hosting Slayer-scape 562, and I have released many different version of slayer-scape so I decided to Release a new Name for My server, Known as Light-To-Dark.
[font=arial][size=12pt]Features of Light-To-Dark[/size][/font]: Divine spirit shield effect is working here is a picture: Dharok's Hit's like a 634 when using the Smash hit, not when using hack Armadyl Godsword Special is fully working: [IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/workingags.png[/img] Bandos Godsword Special Fully working: [IMG]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee464/austin1234able/bgs.png[/img] Zamorak godsword special fully working Working Dbow Rushing Working Dragon Claws Special Attack You Receive a Loot After Killing your opponent and also you keep items on death even in wilderness btw do ::easts to go to kill green dragons for prayer experience you receive 100k prayer experience per bone buried. Working pvp combat and ep system Nice Shop, More to come in v2 This is mainly the expensive shop, also adding a pk drop shop in v2 which is blank shop where you sell items you get from pvp loots, and get a cash reward and where other players can see the items too Virus scan prooving there are no Viruses Also Saradomin sword, hand cannon special, saradomin sword all special's work i just did not have the time to take the screenshots of the Special attack's considering we had to shut down. :(. But Much more to Come in V2
[size=18pt]Btw Client and Source are in Same Package that is why the file is over 80mb, because it is the client and the source package so yeah, guys enjoy and Don't worry v2 might be here in the next week to 2-weeks so i hope you have enjoyed what I have done so far -Defence[/size]
One thing i forgot to mention is i fixed blackscreen, added a login forcechat, Nice starter With Dragon Claws in Starter, Adding a lot more and fixing a lot more glitches thank-you for your time :)!

item.title: Bullet-Scape 562!

item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

How’s the combat and the stability? I’m looking to get into 562s and may use it as a base. What I mean by stability is how many players could it hold on like 512mb? I’m not a leecher or anything, I just want to know about a few things before I just jump into coding it.

Read full topic
